welcome:
Hi @{{username}}!

Use the buttons below to check your balance and explore your wallet.

Want to start sending and receiving $DAG? Join the DAGBot group chat and see how other people are using DAGBot.

For a quick tutorial click 'Help' below.

disclaimer.accept: Yes, I agree with the above.
disclaimer.decline: No, I don't agree with the above disclaimer.

help.title: Choose a topic below, to learn more about it.
help.get_started: What is DAGBot? DAGBot is a fee-less way to share $DAG tokens with your friends and the community. Getting Started Check your balance by clicking on the Balance button below or by clicking /balance. To deposit, use the Deposit button or click /deposit and follow the instructions when prompted. Note: DAGBot only accepts $DAG tokens. To withdraw, use the Withdraw button or click /withdraw.

errors.wallet_not_found: Cannot find your wallet, run /start to setup your wallet.

disclaimer.pending: You must agree to the terms to deposit/withdraw.
disclaimer.finished: Yay, your wallet is created! Deposit some $DAG into your wallet with /deposit
disclaimer.declined: Okay, no worries. If you change your mind, you know where to find us.

deposit.text: Please send your $DAG deposit to: {{wallet_address}} This address is unique to you and all $DAG deposited to this address will be credited to your DAGBot wallet.

withdrawal.text: How much do you want to withdraw? Please enter the amount.
withdrawal.destination_text: Please enter the address you would like to withdraw to. Make sure this is an address you own the private keys to and not an exchange address.
withdrawal.invalid_amount: The amount you entered is invalid, please check your input and try again.
withdrawal.insufficient_balance: You do not have enough $DAG in your wallet. To deposit $DAG, click ‘deposit’.
withdrawal.invalid_destination: The address {{destination}}, is not a valid DAG wallet address! Please check your input, and send the correct destination address again.
withdrawal.own_wallet: You entered your own wallet address {{destination}}, please enter a valid destination address.
withdrawal.confirm_text: Please confirm the withdrawal. Amount to withdraw: {{amount}} DAG to {{destination}}, are you sure?
withdrawal.post_completed: You can follow your transaction on https://www.dagexplorer.io/search/?term={{hash}}
withdrawal.post_cancel: Nothing has been taken from your wallet.
withdrawal.error: Something went wrong with your transfer, nothing has been processed.

tip.confirm_text: Please confirm the transfer. Amount to transfer: {{amount}} DAG to {{destination}}, are you sure?
tip.invalid_format: Invalid format for the /tip command. The format is /tip @username amount. So for example /tip @BotFather 111.23456789
tip.invalid_amount: The amount you entered is invalid, please check your input and try again.
tip.insufficient_balance: You do not have enough $DAG in your wallet. To deposit $DAG, click ‘deposit’.
tip.invalid_target_user: The user you are trying to tip does not have a DAGBot TipJar wallet set up, so you can not send them $DAG.
tip.completed: Transfer completed! You can follow your transaction on https://www.dagexplorer.io/search/?term={{hash}}
